item.title: La Colina
item.dc:creator: Co-broker
item.content:encoded:
RE/MAX ID: 2442
Neighborhood: La Colina
Casa “Inolvidable”- A One-of-a-Kind Oasis. This luxurious Spanish Colonial style home lures the most discerning homebuyer with astounding attention to detail throughout. Artist/Designer Tim Wachter collaborated with sister Theresa to create this masterpiece. Appointed with elements including colonial arches, bóveda domes and wood beamed ceilings, aged colonial style doors, grand rock walls, plentiful cantera, colorful talavera that have been tastefully presented to take your breath away. Upon entering the property you are swept through a lush garden leading you to a central courtyard. Once in the courtyard, your fall captive to the experience that awaits you beyond majestic pool silhouette of the of La Virgen Fatima that shrouds the home with peace and serenity. Upon entering this stunning hacienda-style home, the living room and adjacent dining area share a grand bóveda ceiling flanked by natural stone elements. As the heart of any hacienda is it´s kitchen, Wachter accomplishes a balance of warmth that one would expect in this space with an artful blend of architectural elements and colorful talavera together with grand work spaces and commercial-grade appliances while tastefully staying true to a warm, old Mexico feel. Beyond the kitchen, a convenient multipurpose room, spacious pantry and office. A large loggia including bar and fireplace are the perfect space to enjoy views to the impeccably designed gardens with creeks, ponds, fruit trees and additional outdoor areas; in themselves works of art. The grand master suite with en suite (spa-like) bath, and dressing room is thoughtfully situated on the ground floor giving it privileged access to both the garden on the south side of the property and the central patio and pool area on the north side. There are two additional themed bedrooms on the ground floor with en suite baths. Wachter continues with the same level of detail, an expansive rooftop terrace that hosts a guest casita, multiple exterior seating areas with views to the surrounding mountains as well as a complete kitchen with pizza oven, smoker, grill and refrigerator. Other amenities include a wine cellar and tasting area just off the dining area, double car garage with full laundry area and a pressured, purified water system.
Price in USD unless specified otherwise.
 
Colonia: La Colina
Casa “Inolvidable”- Un Oasis único Esta lujosa y correctamente referida casa Colonial Española cuenta con una ubicación privilegiada dentro de un seguro vecindario sin embargo, es la asombrosa atención a los detalles que todo minucioso comprador aprecia: arcos coloniales, domos de bóveda, vigas y techos de madera abierta, puertas antiguas estilo colonial, paredes de piedra, abundante cantera, colorida talavera y techos de tejamanil lo que le robara el aliento, con la interminable serie de detalles que brincan a los sentidos. Mientras es conducido a través de la gran cochera circular que lleva al patio central que rodea la alberca y la majestuosa representación de la Virgen, será transportado a la casa estilo Hacienda de Timothy Wachter que combina lo mejor de los espacios interiores y exteriores en esta Excepcional Propiedad. Adentro, la sala de estar y el comedor adyacente son poco menos que grandiosos y muestran una inusualmente larga y preciosa bóveda y pared de piedra. La cocina también alberga una gran bóveda, electrodomésticos de alta calidad y áreas de trabajo, cerámica de colorida talavera y un cálido sentimiento del viejo México. A un costado de la cocina se encuentra una recámara multiusos, actualmente ocupada como una espaciosa alacena y oficina. Toda la vista que tienen es a los jardines impecablemente diseñados que contienen estanques, arroyuelos, frutales y otras áreas exteriores de entretenimiento. La recamara principal, localizada en la planta baja y con vista a la alberca y al jardín, es una obra de arte, particularmente el baño. Incluye otra gran bóveda, pared de piedra, tina tipo spa rodeada de plantas y se encuentra adyacente a un gran vestidor. Las otras dos recamaras en la planta baja, cada una con su propio baño, tienen estilos únicos, sin embargo, congruentes con el resto de la casa. El amplio patio cubierto abre hacia el jardín e incluye un bar con chimenea. La extensa terraza contiene múltiples áreas para sentarse, vistas a las montañas de los alrededores así como, una cocina completa con horno de cerámica para pizza, ahumador, asador y refrigerador. En la parte de arriba se encuentra la “casita”, que cuenta con entrada privada, terraza, área para sentarse, nicho de oficina, techos de tejamanil y pisos de madera. Y por supuesto que disfrutara sentarse junto a la alberca, la gema alrededor de la cual se construyó el patio inferior. Otras amenidades incluyen una cava y área de degustación a un costado del comedor, cochera doble con área de lavandería completa y un sistema de agua purificada a presión.
Precio en USD a menos que se especifique lo contrario.

item.title: Montes de Loreto *Under Contract*
item.dc:creator: Co-broker
item.content:encoded: RE/MAX ID: 2445 Neighborhood: Montes de Loreto A contemporary gem sparkles from the hilltop with 360 degree views of San Miguel and the surrounding mountains. The home features an elegant master bedroom with a boveda ceiling, fireplace, private terrace and ensuite bath. Two guest bedrooms with an adjoining bath are located in a separate area across the patio. The central garden adds a fresh, green environment to each room along with a stunning wall fountain. The spacious living room has a Santa Fe style wood burning fireplace and adjoining office. The kitchen with new appliances is adjoined by the dining room with a fireplace. This exceptionally well built house was designed by an artist with unique details such as curved walls, wood beams, rock floors, and 16 cantera columns. Warmth and comfort were considered throughout with solar water heating, floor to ceiling custom designed windows and doors, 3 fireplaces and two roof terraces. A garage and plenty of street parking add to the practicality of this home. The rich culture, great views and quiet area of Montes de Loreto neighborhood are found in just a 20 minute walk to Centro. Price in USD unless specified otherwise   Colonia: Montes de Loreto Una gema contemporánea deslumbra desde lo alto de la colina con vistas hacia los 360 grados de San Miguel y sus montañas. La casa tiene una elegante recámara principal con techo de bóveda, chimenea, terraza privada y elegante baño privado. Las dos recámaras de huéspedes con baño compartido se encuentran en área separada cruzando el patio. El jardín central brinda un ambiente fresco y verde a cada habitación, así como su impresionante fuente de pared. La espaciosa sala cuenta con una chimenea de madera estilo Santa Fe y una oficina adjunta. Una chimenea conecta al comedor con la cocina, la cual cuenta con accesorios nuevos. Esta residencia excepcionalmente diseñada por un artista, cuidando los detalles como paredes curvas, vigas de madera, pisos de piedra y columnas de cantera. La casa ofrece confort y calidez desde el sistema de calefacción solar de agua, ventanales de piso a techo; puertas y ventanas sobre diseño; 3 chimeneas y dos terrazas techadas. Un garage, y suficiente espacio en la calle para estacionamiento, agregan practicidad a esta propiedad. ¡Encontrará riqueza de cultura, grandiosas vistas y un área tranquila en Montes de Loreto, a 20 minutos caminando al centro de San Miguel! Precio en USD a menos que se especifique lo contrario

item.title: Casa Santisima
item.dc:creator: Co-broker
item.content:encoded: RE/MAX ID: 2443 Neighborhood: Santisima Trinidad   Experience the South of France just 20 minutes away from the UNESCO world heritage site of San Miguel de Allende. Contemporary living at it’s finest, this light filled home features all one level living and is being offered tastefully furnished. Double thick German engineered expansive windows invite the outdoors in throughout every room of the home making the most of the picturesque views. The master features a walk in closet and a freestanding porcelain tub and a lovely view of the pool, vineyards and gardens. The other two en suite bedrooms take advantage of the outdoor views as well. The modern kitchen features GE profile stainless appliances. Santisima Trinidad is an exclusive intimate gated community set amongst lavender fields, olive trees and vineyards and offers it’s homeowners the convenience of a farm to table restaurant in an enchanting lakeside setting dotted by jacarandas and Italian cypress. A small boutique hotel with pool on the property is convenient for an overflow of guests who will want to stay to experience this beautiful oasis. An on site gift shop offers the locally made wine, lavender products and olive oil. There is also a polo field and stables for horse enthusiasts. Price in USD unless specified otherwise. Courtesy of Agave Sotheby's International Realty

item.title: Excellent location with lots of space
item.dc:creator: Co-broker
item.content:encoded: RE/MAX ID: 2448 Neighborhood: San Antonio Blue sky, nothing but blue sky! San Miguel is famous for its climate and with the huge amount of outdoor space, this could be your dream house, but also interesting for developers and commercial buyers. The two big plusses are the location on San Juan just off Refugio which puts it a very easy ten or fifteen minute walk to the Jardin. With a little modification you would also get a nice view of the churches. The other big plus is the large amount of land. The four-bedroom house is on the front part of the lot, but most of the land is an open space to the back. This could be turned into a magnificent garden with a pool or casitas. A lot of people are investing in rental property in San Miguel these days and by adding some casitas, you could attract short-term vacation rentals. The property consists of a large four-bedroom house with three full and two half baths, just under 3200 sq ft. Though it is in excellent condition, it would benefit from some renovation for design or aesthetics. As it stands, it could be easily turned into a commercial office property for medical or legal professionals. There is a garage for one car, so it could be transformed into your dream home with just a bit of imagination! Did I mention all the open space? Every time I walk through the house to the land behind I visualize palm and banana trees, little pebbled paths and a magnificent fountain.   Colonia: San Antonio

item.title: Casa del Sol
item.dc:creator: Co-broker
item.content:encoded: RE/MAX ID: 2447 Neighborhood: Centro "Two extraordinary properties, one exceptional value" This exquisite estate boasts some of the most spectacular views in San Miguel from its many terraces and interior spaces. Enjoy the ultimate in privacy and 24/7 guarded security within this exclusive gated community perched above Parque Juarez, yet a relaxing stroll just minutes from the Jardin. Casa: Bedrooms 4 + separate staff quarters / Bathrooms 4 + 3 half baths The main residence of Casa del Sol features three spacious levels of luxurious accommodations, including four en suite bedrooms plus separate staff quarters. The home offers plenty of natural light, warmth and intimacy throughout. Soaring 17th-Century inspired "Conquest" painted and beamed ceilings, intricately carved cantera fireplaces and custom wood cabinetry showcase the fine craftsmanship found in Mexico. All the amenities one would expect in an estate of this pedigree are found at Casa del Sol, including a state-of-the-art Schindler elevator, gourmet kitchen with fireside dining for eight, full water purification system and much more. Common areas include the Privada tennis court. An organically shaped heated plunge pool is set amongst romantic gardens and offers unparalleled views of San Miguel's iconic skyline. Casita: Bedrooms 2 / Bathrooms 2 + 2 half baths The three-level guest house features two ensuite bedrooms and its own parking area. A separate street entrance four levels above the casa connects casa and casita via the Sky Bridge, providing you and your guests the ultimate in privacy and convenience. Enjoy breathtaking views from the casita's main living spaces and its own Sky Terrace, which offers another outdoor space to enjoy cooking, dining and entertaining. Definitely the most fantastic view of any guest house in San Miguel and perhaps all of Mexico! Casa del Sol is truly a one-on-a-kind estate for the discriminating homeowner seeking the rare combination of location in an idyllic setting and an exceptional investment value in the top destination city of the world. Artfully uniting extraordinary homes with extraordinary lives. Courtesy of Agave Sotheby’s International Realty Price in USD unless specified otherwise.

item.title: Casa Aloha Milagros
item.dc:creator: Co-broker
item.content:encoded:
RE/MAX ID: 2452 Neighborhood: Mexiquito   This beautiful home is located in Mexiquito. It offers four bedrooms, three of which could be used as an office or a studio.  There are three full bathrooms (two with tub/shower).  The master bedroom has an en-suite bath with tiled shower and large walk-in closet.  The master suite also opens on to a private patio with sunset views. The first floor has an ample living and dinner area with views of the gardens both front and back.  A skylight in the living and dining area brings additional light into the main floor. The kitchen has a wall of deep cupboards for storage, a full-sized refrigerator, a six-burner gas range and oven and colorful counter tops. The secluded front and back gardens have flowering trees, succulents, flowers and a fruit bearing lemon tree.  There is covered patio space in both the front and back gardens providing special spaces for relaxing or entertaining.  The back garden is very private and features and large waterfall that is soothing to the soul. The house interior has 1,580 square feet with an additional 650 square feet of covered patio space.  Inside the front gate there is space for a small car, ATVs, motorcycles, bikes etc.   The owner kept their car on the street in front of the house for the past 8 years without one negative experience. The neighbors are very nice people.  The owners have not left the neighborhood but have built a new house on the next street over. There is a bus stop across the street from the house that provides a route that encircles the city; with stops at Fabrica Aurora, Calle Hidalgo (5-minute walk to El Jardin), the San Juan del Dios market, the local hospital, La Comer grocery store, and the Tuesday market (Tianguis). The house is a 10-minute walk (.6 mile) to Fabrica Aurora and a 20-minute flat walk to Centro. Price in USD unless specified otherwise.   ___________________________________________________________________   Colonia: Mexiquito   Esta hermosa propiedad se ubica en Mexiquito, que es la salida a los balnearios termales y el corredor dorado, consta de cuatro habitaciones pudiendo adaptarse una como estudio. La máster alberga su propio baño con tina y un amplio vestidor y en adición una terraza privada abierta a las puestas de sol.
En la planta baja contigua a la cocina, el área social posee un tragaluz que ilumina y da amplitud al espacio.
La cocina posee alacenas para un vasto almacenamiento, refrigerador de gran tamaño y estufa empotrada con seis quemadores y horno incluido.
Tanto en la el acceso a la casa como en la parte posterior, hay sendos patios con plantas y flores, en el primero de ellos acceso suficiente para motocicletas, cuatrimoto o un auto compacto y en el segundo una fuente cascada para esos momentos de relajación.
Los propietarios a lo largo de ocho años, han estacionado su auto siempre frente a su casa en la calle sin contratiempos, ello habla de la seguridad y buen vecindario, de hecho no se marchan, han construido una casa mas apegada a sus nuevas necesidades en la cuadra siguiente.
Hay una parada de autobús en la esquina, que circunda la ciudad, que pasando por La Aurora, el centro, La Comer y el tianguis de los martes mantiene excelentemente bien comunicada a quienes la habiten.
Precio en USD a menos que se especifique lo contrario.

item.title: PERFECT ONE-LEVEL- IN MEXIQUITO
item.dc:creator: Co-broker
item.content:encoded:
RE/MAX ID: 2451 Neighborhood: Mexiquito   PERFECT ONE-LEVEL- LIVING with multiple uses and an upstairs apartment for RENTAL INCOME. This architect inspired house has two floors.   The first floor is complete with 2 bedrooms and 2 bathrooms with open living room/dining room and large open kitchen pass through.  The master bedroom is separate in the front of the home with a large circular soaking tub and a separate enclosed shower. Cantera marble counters and sinks are in both bathrooms. The kitchen has granite counter tops and a granite pass through with custom built wood cabinets and a coffee bar. The rear patio, second bedroom and bathroom are close to the kitchen for easy entertaining access. The APARTMENT on the second floor has 2 bedrooms, 2 in suite bathrooms, and a large terrace with a completely enclosed kitchenette, outdoor six seated dining table and casual furniture in a roof-covered separate terrace. The second floor could be rented out as a separate apartment with access from a private outdoor staircase or it could be used for visiting family and friends or for gracious outdoor entertaining. The area behind the house is part of the “green zone” and provides a peaceful, tranquil setting of trees and plants visible from the second-floor terrace.  The first-floor patio has a weeping- water-wall fountain with a surrounding hand set stone garden for flowering plants and rose bushes. There are lights and irrigation pipes submerged into the plants. The separate laundry/storage room is entered from the patio near the water wall. There is ample storage space with three separated closets in the bedroom and four storage cabinets on the second-floor terraces. There is a fireplace in the master bedroom and a cantilevered fireplace in the living room. A separate furniture package can be arranged for your turn-key convenience. Price in USD unless specified otherwise     _______________________________________________________________________________     Colonia: Mexiquito
Dos en uno para rentar y vivir en tu planta baja, ideal para recibir familia y organizar las mejores fiestas en la terraza.
En la planta baja hay dos remaras perfectamente separadas e independientes con tina y encimeras de mármol, una en la parte frontal y la otra contigua a la cocina en la parte posterior, en la cocina equipada se puede atender cómodamente en su espacio abierto al área social que a su vez accede al patio interior con muro llorón.
En la planta alta existen dos amplias recamaras impecablemente iluminadas naturalmente y una cocineta totalmente equipa y resguardable de la intemperie rodeado de hermosa vista arbolada y el patio mas preciso para las mejores fiestas.
Posee covachas para almacenamiento, chimenea y todos los servicios urbanos amen de su proximidad al corredor dorado.
Los muebles son negociables para una adquisición a puerta cerrada.
Precio en USD a menos que se especifique lo contrario.
